participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

lmt_scr_perc_correct.Description: Percentage correct of all 32 presented trials

lmt_scr_perc_wrong.Description: Percentage wrong (including timed out) out of 32 trials.

lmt_scr_num_wrong.Description: Number wrong, not including timed out

lmt_scr_num_timed_out.Description: Number timed out due to lack of response

lmt_scr_avg_rt.Description: Average reaction time for trials. Does not include timed out trials.

lmt_scr_rt_wrong.Description: Average reaction for incorrect trials. Does not include timed out.

lmt_scr_efficiency.Description: LMT Efficiency | Percentage correct divided by average reaction for correct trials

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype1.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Left)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype2.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Right)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype3.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Left)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype4.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Right)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype5.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Left)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype6.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Right)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype7.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Left)

lmt_scr_correct_rt_stimtype8.Description: Latency (msec) for Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Right)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype1.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Left)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype2.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Right)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype3.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Left)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype4.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Right)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype5.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Left)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype6.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Right)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype7.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Left)

lmt_scr_correct_num_stimtype8.Description: Count Number Correct Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype1.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype2.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype3.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype4.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype5.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype6.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype7.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_rt_stimtype8.Description: Latency (msec) for Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype1.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype2.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Down Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype3.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype4.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Backward Up Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype5.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Left)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype6.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Down Right)

lmt_scr_wrong_num_stimtype7.Description: Count Number Wrong Per Stimulus Type (Forward Up Left)

neurocog_2_lmt___1.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]: 1, Audio | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_lmt___2.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]:  2, Video/Webcam | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_lmt___3.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]: 3, In person (ONLY if issues arise and hybrid) | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'

neurocog_2_lmt___4.Description: Method of LMT administration [Check all that apply]: 4, Unmonitored | 1=Yes; 0=No [sched_hybrid] = '1'
